content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LSEG Account - Org view\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Org structure of LSEG account in EPAM mirrors org structure of LSEG divisions. There are 3 main divisions in LSEG – Data & Analytics, Shared Tech and Corp Tech / Tech Ops. There is also 4th division on EPAM side – Emerging – for new areas which are not big enough to be represented by separate division yet. Divisions consists of Product Engineering Groups (PEGs).  PEGs are partially formed around some logical groups of LSEG products (e.g. trading apps), partially structured according to historical reasons.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":65422,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d93d54d1-c2ba-44e4-bd9a-43c850f347b7/Block3 Pic1 new.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d93d54d1-c2ba-44e4-bd9a-43c850f347b7/Block3 Pic1 new.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Block3 Pic1 new.jpg\",\"name\":\"Block3 Pic1 new.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d93d54d1-c2ba-44e4-bd9a-43c850f347b7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":816,\"height\":370},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LSEG IT Ecosystem – high level view\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LSEG IT ecosystem view above is mostly related to LSEG parts with EPAM presence. This is mostly Refinitv / ThomsonReuters part of LSEG business (financial & market data provision) + some trading venues and services.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":68580,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f28d02b4-2a49-41ea-b542-64916594fb9f/Block2Picture2.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f28d02b4-2a49-41ea-b542-64916594fb9f/Block2Picture2.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Block2Picture2.jpg\",\"name\":\"Block2Picture2.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f28d02b4-2a49-41ea-b542-64916594fb9f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":823,\"height\":374},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LSEG
